triples.name: Offline learning
triples.relevance: The paper's core subject, focusing on learning from fixed datasets without additional online interaction.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The foundational machine learning paradigm that the paper reviews and builds upon.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Combines reinforcement learning with deep learning, the modern approach discussed extensively in the paper.

triples.name: Decision-making
triples.relevance: The broader application domain for offline RL methods discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Robotics
triples.relevance: One of the key application domains mentioned for automated decision-making using offline RL.

triples.name: Health care
triples.relevance: A key application domain where offline RL could automate decision-making processes.

triples.name: Education
triples.relevance: An application domain where offline RL methods could improve automated decision-making systems.
